name: Candy Rangers
storyline:
Play as Candy, Mint, Plum or Lemon, four sisters that work as rangers to pay the bills and live together.
Each character has their own way of shooting, Candy shoots bullets in an horizontal pattern, Mint in a vertical pattern, Lemon in a cross pattern and Plum in a short but wide range pattern.
summary: Candy Rangers is an On Rail Shooter based around taking the most enemies out with a single shot.
